thread.title: Charlamagne Shuts Down The 'Cash Me Outside' Girl | DJ Sandman | 95.7 The Beat
thread.title_full: Charlamagne Shuts Down The 'Cash Me Outside' Girl | DJ Sandman | 95.7 The Beat

title: Charlamagne Shuts Down The 'Cash Me Outside' Girl | DJ Sandman | 95.7 The Beat
text:
share 
The Breakfast Club's Charlamagne Tha God Rejects An Interview Request from Danielle Bregoli aka ‘Cash Me Outside’ Girl.. Since her appearance on Dr. Phil, Danielle Bregoli, the "Cash Me Outside...How Bow Dat" girl has been the newest internet celebrity. She has since gained millions of instagram followers, appeared in a Kodak Black video, has thousands of meme's circulating, and even started her own clothing line. Trying to make the best of her current internet fame, she hired an agent to book her for club appearances and interviews. They reached out to Charlamagne Tha God from Power 105's The Breakfast Club trying to secure an interview. Charlamagne took a screen shot of their interaction and posted on his instagram. Check his response below: ✌️ A post shared by Charlamagne Thagod (@cthagod) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:13am PST Widely regarded as the “Godfather of Hip-Hop” in the Tampa Bay area, DJ Sandman has been a fixture in the Tampa Bay Hip-Hop community for over seventeen years.Beginning as a fan in high school, his career started in radio at WBUL (University of South Florida) as a DJ and Hip Hop music director. Sandman built a network of fans, clients and connections djing campus parties and at clubs in the local party district which led to promoting parties throughout the Tampa Bay Area; Bringing hip hop to the area in the early 90’s when no one else dared.Sandman has always kept his ear to the concrete and that’s how stays in touch with the hottest sounds from the streets. He has opened as a Dj for many national artists in his market. He is a member of the world famous " Bumsquad Dj " crew and can also be credited as one of the first promoters to bring Hip Hop shows to Tampa, Fl.He is also the tour DJ for local artist Dynasty and has been all over the world spinning at shows with her.
